name: The Mansion
description:
What's hiding in Alvin's past? What secrets will you discover traversing The Mansion? ...


Explore the seemingly abandoned mansion and uncover the secrets. What dark memories hide in the shadows? Find out the truth behind the dark ghosts following you - what's their role in your life, and why they keep haunting you?...



Collect items that will aid you in your quest. They will help you in your journey - their power comes from memories, the only thing that's left after your mother passed away.



The house and its surroundings hide many secrets. Find the hidden paths, open secret doors, and let Alvin's story unravel before your eyes. Look in every nook and cranny to draw the complete map of the Mansion - with everything that's left behind, the trails will lead you to the truth...



  • Discover what lurks within the walls of The Mansion
  • Play as Alvin in the first-person view and unravel secrets from his past
  • Solve diverse puzzles to ultimately escape the cursed house
  • Explore The Mansion and its surroundings
  • Collect your memories
  • Don't let the ghosts of the past haunt you
  • Find the truth
